captions.text:
[MUSIC]
>>THIS IS BREAKING NEWS FROM CHANNEL 8.

>>HOW'S MY HAIR? WELL YOU KNOW, COME ON! SCOTT
STERLING.

>>WHAT IS THIS?
>>SCOTT YOU HAD A TREMENDOUS GAME AGAINST

NORTH CAROLINA-
>>-I SAID NO INTERVIEWS-

>>AND WE'RE RECEIVED REPORTS THAT SOCCER TEAMS
FROM ALL AROUND THE GLOBE ARE LOOKING TO DRAFT

YOU. WHAT IS YOUR COMMENT ON THAT. WHAT ARE
YOUR THOUGHTS?

>>ALL RIGHT, WHAT-- HOW DARE YOU! THIS MAN
HAS DISGUSTING SOUP FOR A FACE AND YOU EXPECT

HIM TO GIVE YOU AN INTERVIEW RIGHT NOW? HUH?
HUH? NO MIRRORS. YOU'LL SCARE YOURSELF.

>>BUT FANS EVERYWHERE WANT TO KNOW IS SCOTT
STERLING RETURNING TO THE FIELD? WILL HE PLAY

AGAIN?
>>YOU KNOW, WILL GLOBAL WARMING KILL US ALL?

WILL TAXES EVER GO DOWN? WILL MY MOM EVER
HUG ME? NO ONE KNOWS BUT IT DOESN'T LOOK GOOD!

>>SCOTT, YOUR FANS ARE CLAMORING TO BUY YOUR
JERSEY--

>>YOU KNOW WHAT? HIS JERSEY IS NOT FOR SALE,
OKAY? NO! WHAT IS THIS? GET RID OF THIS BOX

RIGHT NOW! OKAY? JUST LEAVE HIM BE OKAY? HE’S
GOT ROAD KILL FOR A FACE. COME ON! GIVE HIM

SYMPATHY! WHERE ARE YOU GETTING ALL THESE
MIRRORS?

>>SCOTT, SCOTT-
>>MAM, I NEED YOU OUT OF HERE-

>>NO, WE JUST HAVE A FEW MORE QUESTIONS-
>>NO, I NEED YOU OUT OF HERE-

>>SCOTT, WILL YOU PLAY PROFESSIONALLY?
>>GO, GET OUT OF HERE!

>>GET OUT! GET OUT!
>>HOW LONG IS YOUR RECOVERY EXPECTED TO TAKE?

>>GET OUT.
>>HOW MUCH ARE YOUR TEETH GOING FOR ON EBAY?

WHAT ARE YOU- LOOK IN THERE.
>>THANK YOU.

>>I'M A BIG SCOTT STERLING FAN. YOU THINK
HE'D MIND SIGNING MY SOCCER BALL?

>>I DON'T KNOW. YOU KNOW HE IS JUST. OKAY
HE'LL DO IT.

>>THANKS SCOTT. I'M SORRY! IT SLIPPED.
>>BRADEN, OVER HERE. UH, WE'VE JUST RECEIVED

WORD FROM OUR NEWS STATION THAT THE L.A. GALAXY
WANTS TO MAKE SCOTT AN OFFER. WE'LL GIVE YOU

UPDATES AS THE STORY UNFOLDS.
[SMACK]

>>OH SORRY! IT SLIPPED AGAIN! BUTTER FINGERS.
>>YOU PEOPLE HAVE NO SHAME. DO NOT CLICK ON

THIS BOX. SCOTT STERLING IS A MAN, NOT SOME
COMMERCIAL ENTERPRISE. IT DOESN'T MATTER HOW

GOOD THIS SHIRT LOOKS OR THAT ITS REASONABLY
PRICED, AND WHATEVER YOU DO, DON'T BUY IT

FOR A FRIEND OF A FAMILY MEMBER. THEY DON'T
NEED THAT STUFF AND-- IS THIS 100 PERCENT

COTTON? IT DOESN'T MATTER OKAY? JUST DON'T.
OKAY BUD? NO?

title: Scott Sterling Breaking News Update - Studio C

comments.text:
Hey, I'm a little confused here. I missed the first time these were on 
sale, but on the website it says if 19 more people reserve one they can put 
the design back up. I thought this was pretty cool, and I still want one of 
the jerseys, so I reserved one. This was two weeks ago, and it stills says 
they need 19 more. It also says there were 0 sold during the original 
campaign. Is this jersey really that unpopular, or is it a glitch with the 
website, or what?﻿
